name: Friday Night Funkin': Benjine
description:
Open source rhythm game excellence paired with open source game engine excellence!

The Friday Night Funkin': Benjine is a full-fledged recreation of Friday Night Funkin' using the Godot game engine and an fangame engine for Friday Night Funkin' mods.

  • Accuracy - Made to be as accurate as possible (whenever possible) to what's currently available in the original FNF, gameplay and all
  • Flexibility - Characters, levels, cutscenes, options--you name it, you can add it to the base Benjine. Need to make heavy changes? Create your own experience as an advanced mod!*
  • Extensibility - Use the Godot editor and any feature of the engine as the modding editor for the Benjine

Start modding with the Benjine here! Or also support it on GameJolt!

Note: This HTML5 version of the Benjine uses WebGL 2.0. Also, the desktop versions are the optimal way to play.

*Coming soon
